snippet: A court has upheld a death sentence for a man who fatally stabbed a doctor and severely wounded another in the coastal city of Wenling last year. Attacks on medical staff are disturbingly common in China.
abstract: A court has upheld a death sentence for a man who fatally stabbed a doctor and severely wounded another in the coastal city of Wenling last year. Attacks on medical staff are disturbingly common in China.

headline.main: Death Sentence Is Upheld for Doctor's Killer
